fields.name: Nylon Prada Duet Shoulder Bag
fields.description: A fabric shoulder bag with a drawstring closure. The gold-toned logo, zipper and hardware accent the monochrome piece, which offers a single handle and detachable shoulder strap for versatility. Leather handle, Detachable and adjustable 120 cm leather shoulder strap, Zipper pocket, Metal hardware, Enameled metal triangle logo on the pocket, Drawstring closure, Prada logo nylon lining, 22.5 cm Height, 12 cm Length, 17.5 cm width

fields.name: Saffiano Leather Mini Envelope Bag
fields.description: The emblematic Prada lettering logo decorates the front of this mini envelope bag with front flap. The accessory with magnet closure has a shoulder strap that lets it be worn as a crossbody or shoulder bag. The nappa lining has a small pocket with removable mirror. Saffiano leather, Detachable adjustable 90 cm logo-print woven shoulder strap, Pocket under the flap, Metal hardware, Metal lettering logo on flap, Magnetic flap closure, Nappa leather interior with pocket with removable mirror and card slot, 12 cm Height, 4 cm Length, 20 cm width

fields.name: Large Saffiano Leather Wallet
fields.description: A Saffiano leather flap wallet with gold-finish Prada lettering. The monotone exterior hides multi-colored leather lining inside, as well as various compartments, pockets and an extractable badge holder. Multicolored Saffiano leather lining, Snap closure, Metal lettering logo, Two bill compartments, Ten card slots, Four interior pockets, Internal coin pocket with zipper, External zipper pocket, Moire and Saffiano leather lining, With detachable badge holder, 9.5 cm Height, 18.7 cm width

fields.name: Small Saffiano Leather Wallet
fields.description: This Saffiano leather wallet embellished by the metal lettering logo has a zipper and snap closure. It has several compartments, pockets and slots. The interior is in contrasting colors. Multicolored Saffiano leather lining, Snap fastener, Metal lettering logo, One bill compartment, Four card slots, Six internal pockets, External coin pocket with zipper, Moire and Saffiano leather lining, 8.5 cm Height, 12 cm width

fields.name: Christy England Spa Robe Grey
fields.description: Spa Robe by Welspun - Grey, 320GSM, 52% Polyester, 48% Cotton, Super soft touch, Ultimate home spa experience, Also available in White

fields.name: Christy England Spa Robe White
fields.description: Spa Robe by Welspun - White, 320GSM, 52% Polyester, 48% Cotton, Super soft touch, Ultimate home spa experience, Also available in Grey

fields.name: Christy England Christy Supreme Velour Robe Thistle
fields.description: Supreme Velour Robe - Thistle, 100% cotton, 400GSM, Velour texture with shawl collar, Unisex, Luxuriously soft, Sustainably made - MADE IN GREEN certified

fields.name: Christy England Luxury Egyptian Robe Dove Grey
fields.description: Luxury Egyptian Robe - Dove Grey, 100% Egyptian cotton, 420GSM, Textured ribbing, Luxuriously soft

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Love by Victoria Unlined Plunge Lace Teddy
fields.description: In delicate lace, sheer mesh and microfiber, a retro-inspired teddy with a modern plunge neckline, strappy back and our gold-tone hardware., Unlined, Wireless, Plunge neckline, Adjustable straps, Our logo gold-tone hardware, Keyhole at back, Hook closure at back, No back coverage, Machine wash, Imported, Lace: 89% polyamide, 11% elastane, Front lining/back panel: 88% polyamide, 12% elastane, Lower body: 82% polyamide, 18% elastane, Gusset: 100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Unlined Corded Lace Teddy
fields.description: This sumptuous one-piece teddy in elegant lace and tulle showcases a strappy silhouette at the back. Unlined, Strappy silhouette at back, Tie detail at back, Adjustable straps, Back closure, Thong bottom, Machine wash, Imported, Body/cup: 100% polyamide, Back: 87% polyamide, 13% elastane, Gusset: 100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Unlined Floral Lace Teddy
fields.description: Secret garden. With embroidered floral tulle in a strappy silhouette, gold-tone hardware and daring cutouts for contrast, this teddy is almost too perfect to hide. Sheer, unlined, Strappy silhouette, Adjustable crossback straps, Back hook closure, Thong bottom, Hand wash, Imported, Body: 100% polyamide, Embroidery: 100% polyester, Gusset: 100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Chantilly Lace Robe
fields.description: A longer version of our classic wrap style, in luxe satin with a sheer Chantilly lace back. Relaxed fit, Tie waist, 39“ from shoulder; hits at knee, Machine wash, Imported, Body: 97% polyester 3% elastane , Lace: 100% polyamide exclusive of decoration, Imported, Body: 100% polyamide, Embroidery: 100% polyester, Gusset: 100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Silk Robe
fields.description: Crafted from luxurious silk, this effortless wrap robe is an absolute must-have. Tie waist, Hits at waist, Machine wash, Imported, 100% silk

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Floral Embroidered Robe
fields.description: Floral embroidery blooms across silky satin for a covered-up look that's just beautiful. Floral embroidery, Puff sleeve with lace accents, Tie waist, Hits at knee, Machine wash, Imported

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Chiffon Pleated Babydoll
fields.description: Such a flirt, in sheer lace with a pleated chiffon skirt and matching panty. Sheer, unlined, Pulls on; no closure, 28 inches from shoulder, hits below waist, Matching thong panty, Hand wash, Imported, Top, Lace 78% polyamide, 22% elastane, Body 100% polyester exclusive ofdecoration, Panty, Lace 78% polyamide, 22% elastane, Gusset 100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Pleated Babydoll
fields.description: Get glamorous in georgette, with pretty pleats, a shiny ribbon bow and a matching thong panty. Triangle lace cups, Empire waist with satin bow, Adjustable straps, Matching thong panty, Imported, Panty, Body 100% silk, Gusset 100% cotton exclusive of decoration, Body 100% polyester, Lace 90% polyamide, 10% elastane exclusive of decoration

fields.name: Victoria’s Secret Unlined Lace Plunge Babydoll
fields.description: Sweet on this. Our ultra-feminine babydoll in allover delicate lace, with a playful skirt, plunge neckline and an open back. Unlined, Halter neckline, Open back, Elastic waist with tie closure at back, Attached garters, Matching panty, Machine wash, Imported, Body  82% polyamide, 18% elastane, Cup  87% polyamide, 13% elastane exclusive of decoration, Panty Body  88% polyamide, 12% elastane, Gusset  100% cotton exclusive of decoration

fields.name: GymShark CTY Joggers
fields.description: Move with ease anywhere you please in the CTY Joggers. A regular fit and double waistband keep you comfortable, whilst cuffed drawcord ankles add extra style points. Wear this staple piece on the go during your active rest days. Boxy fit, Double waistband, Drawcord to ankle, Logo to back right, Non-stretch woven, Inner 100% Nylon / Outer: 100% Polyester, We've cut down on our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one, Made at RSI Global Limited, Bangladesh

fields.name: GymShark Adapt Animal Seamless Leggings
fields.description: Feeling wild? The Adapt Animal Seamless Leggings feature animal pattern jacquard all over, a flatter high-rise fit, ruche detailing to bum and breathable seamless fabric. We have no doubt you will look, and feel, great in these. High waisted fit, All-over animal jacquard, Ruched detail to bum, Elongated ribbed waistband, Printed logo to upper left hip and back left ankle, 79% Polyamide, 15% Polyester, 6% Spandex, We've cut down on our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one

fields.name: GymShark Vital Seamless Leggings
fields.description: High waisted fit, Supportive ribbed waistband, Seamless shading contouring patterns, Sweat-wicking fabric, 58% Nylon, 32% Polyester, 10% Elastane, Label Colour: Smokey Grey Marl Train, sweat and perform in the Vital Seamless Leggings. Combining a high-waisted fit, sweat-wicking fabric and seamless contours, they’re constructed to ensure confidence and support for a workout, with additional style for good measure.

fields.name: GymShark Training Cropped Sweater
fields.description: The perfect throw-over, whether you’re just getting going or winding down, the Training Cropped Sweater gives you the extra layer you need. The cropped length and wide selection of colours secure its position as a locker essential. Cropped length, Cuffed wrists, Crew neck, Logo to chest, Main: 70% Cotton, 30% Polyester. Rib: 96% Cotton, 4% Elastane, We've cut down on our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one, Made at RT KNITS, Maritius

fields.name: GymShark Essential Bomber Jacket
fields.description: Bomber style jacket, Full zip to front, Ribbed neck, cuffs and hem, Open pockets to each side, Zip pocket to chest, Printed logo to arm, Main: 100% Polyester. Secondary 93% Cotton, 7% Spandex, Label colour Moss Grey. Work the pavement on your way to work out. The Essential Bomber is the perfect top layer for your journey to/from training, or any journey for that matter with its quilted body and light insulation layer. A jacket is only ever as good as its pocket options, and this one’s got plenty; open pockets to the sides and a zip pocket to the chest. Woven material and ribbed cuffs, neck and hem complete this classic jacket.

fields.name: GymShark Oversized Puffer Jacket
fields.description: Zip the world out. Oversized fit, Fully lined interior, Zip front with branded puller, Contrast taping to sleeves, Funnel neck with internal tab for hanging, Zip pockets to chest and open internal pocket, Elastic feature to waistband for cinched waist, Metal decal logo, Main 100% Polyester. Lining: 100% Polyester, Label Colour Slate Lavender/Pink Salt. The Oversized Puffer Jacket is casual in all but protection. With a relaxed fit, feature contrast taping to the sleeves and a high funnel neck, it promotes an aesthetic of attitude while including a lined interior, a matte finish and a zip front to offer all you could want from your outerwear layer.

fields.name: Whittard Coffees of the World Gift Set
fields.description: Like a choice when it comes to coffee? This bestselling gift stars nine of our favourites, ranging from dark to light roasts – all perfectly packaged in boxes adorned with illustrations by Persephone Coelho.

fields.name: Whittard The Discovery Hamper
fields.description: A hamper-packed showcase of the finest tea, coffee and hot chocolate. Discover our Earl Grey and Chelsea Breakfast loose leaf black teas, dark, smoky Monsoon Malabar coffee and signature Luxury and Luxury White hot chocolates – with the sweet addition of our Earl Grey biscuits and Milk, Dark & White chocolate coated espresso beans.

fields.name: Whittard The Just Brew it Coffee Gift Box
fields.description: For delicious coffee with no faff and no frills, we’ve packed a gift box with a pre-ground valve pack of our citrusy, medium roast San Agustin Colombia coffee, a nifty Brew It Stick and our stylish Nova double-walled glass.

fields.name: Whittard Bialetti Moka Express 6-cup Stovetop
fields.description: Bialetti's distinctive 8-sided aluminium pot features a 3-part system that uses pressurised steam to push the boiling water up through the coffee grounds: a lower water chamber, a filter coffee basket and a top chamber for the brewed coffee. Includes, Stovetop, Number of servings 6 espresso cups, Coffee format Ground coffee, espresso grind, Brewing time 5 minutes

fields.name: Whittard The Earl Grey Afternoon Tea Hamper
fields.description: Hosting afternoon tea? Open the lid to find a caddy of our classic citrusy Earl Grey loose leaf tea, an impressive Chatsford 6-Cup Teapot, four elegant fluted mugs and a tin of Earl Grey-infused all butter biscuits. Now that’s a fancy tea party.

fields.name: Whittard The Tea Discovery Collection
fields.description: A world tour in a teacup, we've chosen eight of our favourite black and green teabags to give you a taste of our globe-spanning range – elegantly enclosed in vintage-style patterned boxes.

fields.name: Harrods Jonathan Adler Sorrento Mugs
fields.description: Bright colours and geometric prints are two staple design features that sing throughout Jonathan Adler's work, and the two meet happily on these Sorrento mugs. Crafted from high-fired porcelain and showcasing a design inspired by 1960s Italian patterns, they'll transport you to the rivieras of the Mediterranean with each sip

fields.name: Harrods Wedgwood Hummingbird Teapot Set
fields.description: Inspired by the grandeur of the natural world, the Hummingbird collection from Wedgwood features a beguiling pattern. Depicting vivid flowers and beautiful hummingbirds buzzing along a deep blue backdrop, this is an elegant collection that speaks of gastronomical refinement. This teapot, creamer and sugar bowl set is a prime example, bringing a sense of luxury to teatime

fields.name: Harrods Halcyon Days Set
fields.description: Handcrafted in Stoke-on-Trent, this Halcyon Days set is an elegant representation of the homeware specialist's keen attention to even the smallest details. The fine bone china has been intricately decorated with the Al Fresco print, boasting blooming branches of foliage to celebrate the natural world’s majestic beauty, while a glimmering gold-tone trim renders each cup and saucer truly deserving of collectible status

fields.name: Liz Earle Overnight Restore Routine
fields.description: Wake up to beautiful, healthy looking skin by indulging in our lovingly curated relaxing ritual that’s suitable for all skin types. Begin by melting away the day’s make up, pollution and impurities with Cleanse &Polish Hot Cloth Cleanser, following with Instant Boost Skin Tonic to hydrate, refresh and soothe. Finally, creamy CICA Restore Skin Paste, enriched with powerful botanical ingredients, delivers 48 hours of intense hydration to visibly improve the appearance of imperfections overnight. What’s included? Cleanse & Polish Hot Cloth Cleanser 100ml tube, Instant Boost Skin Tonic 50ml bottle, CICA Restore Skin Paste 50ml tube, 2 pure cotton cloths

fields.name: Liz Earle Daily Routine with Skin Repair
fields.description: Boost your radiance ready for spring with our cleanse, tone and moisturise trio. Begin with multi award-winning Cleanse & Polish™ Hot Cloth Cleanser to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate for smoother, clearer-looking skin. Follow with our hydrating Instant Boost™ Skin Tonic scented with uplifting Bergamot & Basil, then finish with our preferred Skin Repair™ Moisturiser – available in our exclusive 50ml tube to deliver 72 hours of lasting hydration for your skin. What’s included? Cleanse & Polish Hot Cloth Cleanser 200ml tube, Bergamot & Basil Instant Boost Skin Tonic 200ml bottle, Pure cotton cloths 2 pure cotton cloths, Bergamot & Basil Body Cream 200ml tube, Bergamot & Basil Hand Repair 50ml tube

fields.name: Liz Earle Ultimate Liz Earle Hamper
fields.description: The height of luxury, this indulgent gift is filled with layer upon layer of naturally active face and body treats to surprise and delight. Receiving one is like having your birthday, anniversary and Christmas all rolled into one. Kit contents, Cleanse & Polish Hot Cloth Cleanser 100ml pump, Instant Boost Skin Tonic 200ml bottle, Choice of Skin Repair Moisturiser 50ml jar, Superskin Moisturiser with natural neroli 50ml jar, Superskin Concentrate for Night 10ml rollerball, Superskin Face Serum 30ml pump, Gentle Face Exfoliator 70ml pump, Balancing Gel Mask 50ml jar, Brightening Treatment Mask 50ml pump, Superskin Dry Oil for Body 100ml spray, Botanical Shine Shampoo 200ml tube, Botanical Shine Conditioner for Normal Hair 200ml tube, Botanical Shine Nourishing Hair Oil 50ml pump, Orange Flower Botanical Body Wash 200ml bottle, Orange Flower Hand Wash 200ml pump, Orange Flower Hand Repair 150ml pump, Eyebright Soothing Eye Lotion 150ml bottle, Botanical Essence No.15 Eau de Parfum 50ml, 2 pure cotton cloths

fields.name: Liz Earle Daily Routine with Superskin
fields.description: Boost your radiance ready for spring with our cleanse, tone and moisturise trio. Begin with multi award-winning Cleanse & Polish™ Hot Cloth Cleanser to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate for smoother, clearer-looking skin. Follow with our hydrating Instant Boost™ Skin Tonic scented with uplifting Bergamot & Basil, then finish with your choice of luxurious Superskin™ Moisturiser – with natural neroli or unfragranced for sensitive skin – to firm, plump and smooth. What’s included? Cleanse & Polish Hot Cloth Cleanser 200ml tube, Bergamot & Basil Instant Boost Skin Tonic 200ml bottle, Pure cotton cloths 2 pure cotton cloths, Bergamot & Basil Body Cream 200ml tube, Bergamot & Basil Hand Repair 50ml tube

fields.name: Tropic ABC Skincare Collection
fields.description: What’s great about a multivitamin is that it has everything you need in one tidy package. The same could be said for our ABC skincare collection. Containing our Smoothing Cleanser, Vitamin Toner and Skin Feast you also get to choose one of our three freshly made face masks – Face Lift, Clear Skin or Deep Hydration – depending on your skin concerns. Providing you with all the tools you need, if you’re never sure where to start your good skin journey, this is a recipe for success. You’ll also receive one of our bamboo face cloths and if you have sensitive skin you can choose the unscented, essential oil-free versions of our Smoothing Cleanser, Vitamin Toner and Skin Feast. What are you waiting for? What’s included? Smoothing Cleanser, Vitamin Toner, Skin Feast, Face Mask

fields.name: Tropic Body Smooth Refreshing Polish
fields.description: Drumroll please because this was the first ever Tropic product. Created by founder Susie when she was 15, it was a throwback to her time spent in Cairns, Australia where she would make it in her mum’s kitchen using local ingredients. Introducing it to the masses at London’s Greenwich Market, now everyone can get their hands on the body polish that will leave your limbs soft, subtly scented and silky smooth. Full of mineral-rich sea salts to remove dead skin and citrusy oils that give it a mouth-watering lemon sorbet scent, it’s pure indulgence in a jar. What’s included? 200ml Body Polish

fields.name: Tropic Unwind Me Collection
fields.description: Dial down the noise and slip into the land of slumber with our wonderful Unwind Me collection. Our sleep gift set consists of a selection of lavender-infused products. It’s like pressing the mute button on a busy mind so you can get a restful night’s sleep without any tossing and turning. The ultimate present for anyone who is forever on the go, rarely gets any me-time or who’s caught in a cycle of counting sheep, it’s rest, recuperation and relaxation in one beautiful box. What’s included? So Sleepy Luxury Bath Foam, So Sleepy Whipped Body Velvet, So Sleepy Temple Roll-On, Bamboo Spatula

fields.name: Tropic Walk on the Beach Foot Collection
fields.description: In just three steps your feet will be soft, smooth and sandal ready, even if it’s in the middle of winter. Featuring Ocean Fizz, a relaxing foot soak to loosen dead skin cells and revive feet, our Polishing Foot Pebble, which uses exotic ingredients like volcanic ash and white Bora Bora sands to gently exfoliate, and our Repairing Foot Remedy that deals with hard skin that needs some extra nourishing. Plus, you have the option to buy it box-free for an eco-friendly alternative. What’s included? Ocean Fizz Foot Soak, Polishing Foot Pebble, Repairing Foot Remedy

fields.name: Tropic Hair Care Discovery Kit
fields.description: A selection box of four hair products that will ensure your hair stays protected from damage, your colour stays vibrant and your scalp stays healthy, do as the pro’s do and cocktail the products together until you find your dream regime. Containing mini versions of our Hair Feast, Hair Smooth, Clarifying Hair Wash and Nourishing Hair Cleanser, it’s also a great option if you’re on the move or staying away as they’re the perfect travel-size. All using biodegradable, pH-balanced ingredients, you’ll just have fabulous looking hair without compromise. What’s included? Hair Feast, Hair Smooth, Clarifying Hair Wash, Nourishing Hair Cleanser

fields.name: Tropic Perfect Touch Collection
fields.description: Shaping and shining nails and infusing hands with moisture is the aim of the game with this nifty three-step kit. Containing our iconic Superfood Hand Therapy that conditions and brightens, our nail block to shape, buff and smooth nails and our pretty Organic Nail Nectar that will nourish and strengthen nails. All that’s left for you to do is apply some polish and you’ve got a five-star at-home manicure. What’s included? Superfood Hand Therapy, Nail block, Organic Nail Nectar

fields.name: Bobbi Brown Cult Favorites – Pop of Color
fields.description: Treat yourself or a loved one to the ultimate bundle for face and lips, with the Bobbi Brown Cult Favourites - Pop of Colour. The sumptuous lip colour is ideal for adding a splash of rosy pink to your face, all the while keeping it subtle, natural-looking and dewy, while the rouge offers a girl-next-door flush that is quick and easy to use. The versatile 2-in-1 blush and lip colour removes the need to bring several products with you on the go at once, making it the ideal travel companion to add an injection of colour to your face whenever you need it. Enriched with creamy, luxurious formulas, you can guarantee your skin will be left feeling hydrated and replenished after every use, instead of dry or cakey. What’s included? Luxe Lip Color in Neutral Rose (3.8g) Create the look of a smooth, kissable pout with the sumptuous lipstick. The creamy formula drifts effortlessly across your lips, drenching the skin in moisture without leaving any sticky residue behind. The buildable nature of the formula means top-ups on the go are quick and easy, alleviating the risk of a crumbly, cakey finished look. The non-drying liquid promotes long-lasting and intense hydration, while the highly-pigmented colour is destined to make you turn heads and stand out in a crowd. Luxurious and opulent, the lipstick is encased in gold-toned packaging, making it an eye-catching piece to take with you on the go. Pot Rouge for Lips & Cheeks in Powder Pink (3.7g) Add a flush of colour to your complexion with an award-winning cream colour that adds a beautiful, healthy glow to your makeup. The best-selling, two-in-one product delivers creamy colour that can be dabbed and blended onto apples of the cheeks, or blotted onto lips for a soft, stained effect. Creating a complementary makeup look, it imparts a 'just-pinched' flush onto cheeks and a beautiful hint of colour onto lips. Wear alone or with lip liners and lip glosses. If your skin is prone to dryness, ensure to moisturise before application. Housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-go touch-ups.

fields.name: Bobbi Brown Pretty Powerful Set
fields.description: The Bobbi Brown Pretty Powerful Set is truly a must-have collection. Uniting skincare and makeup, the gift set features 5 powerhouse products to instantly beautify and refresh complexions. What’s included? Long-Wear Cream Shadow Stick in Golden Bronze. This pigmented eyeshadow swipes on smooth, creamy colour. Easily blended, the shadow offers buildable coverage that makes a bold statement. It is housed in a stick applicator to give maximum precision during use. The eyeshadow stick creates a sensational look with smudge-proof wear, lasting for up to 8 hours. Pot Rouge for Lips & Cheeks in Powder Pink. A best-selling cream blusher that gives a soft-focus, rosy flush. This blush adds an instant pop of colour with a glowing finish. Boasting two-in-one benefits, it can also be used as a lightweight lip stain. Mini Smokey Eye Mascara 3ml Dramatise your lashes with this kohl-black mascara. The creamy formula adds length, volume and curl for a seriously fanned-out effect. Packed with pigment, the mascara applies smoothly and evenly to resist clumping, flaking and crumbling. Mini Soothing Cleansing Oil 15ml This cleansing oil is a sure customer favourite, designed to melt away even the most stubborn eye makeup – including waterproof. Botanical Oils unite to dissolve surface-level impurities, featuring White Jasmine Flower and extracts of Kukui Nut, White Water Lily and Goji Berry for a soothing treat. Mini Vitamin Enriched Face Base 7ml A best-selling, 2-in-1 moisturiser and primer. This face cream effortlessly preps and hydrates the skin, employing quenching ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter and Vitamin B5. It also helps to brighten tone while protecting against UV exposure, thanks to antioxidant-rich Vitamins C and E. Plus, this product preps the complexion for flawless makeup wear, acting as a long-lasting foundation base.

fields.name: Bobbi Brown Easy on the Eyes Collection
fields.description: Create multiple eye looks with 3 of Bobbi Brown’s best-selling Long-Wear Cream Shadow Stick shades, plus a Smokey Eye Mascara to make your eyes really stand out. What’s included? Long-Wear Cream Shadow Stick (3 x Mini) Add definition and drama to your eyes with this smooth, creamy formula that glides dreamily across your eye-area. It boasts a buildable fluid texture making blending and adding depth quick and easy. Perfect for people that are pressed for time, like their makeup routine to be short and sweet or want something that can be applied on the go. The ingenious shadow stick simply requires a few gentle strokes to reveal sumptuous colour, with the impressive budge-proof product lasting an impressive eight hours. Draw attention to your already striking eye-area as the smouldering shadow makes your eye colour pop, while never sinking into fine lines or creases. Go from daytime prettiness to party-ready glamour in minutes. Smokey Eye Mascara (6ml) The creamy kohl-black mascara lengthens, thickens and fans out the lashes for a dramatic effect that complements an intense smokey eye. Buildable and long-lasting, the non-flaking, non-clumping formula glides on to lashes, offering great coverage with the minimum of effort.

fields.name: Bobbi Brown SELF-CARE SKINCARE SET
fields.description: Time for a little TLC! Treat yourself to a pamper night (or a few!) with this gorgeous set full of our moisturising favourites. Includes 1 moisturiser Vitamin Enriched Face Base as well as a few of our best-selling products for the ultimate hydration. All products packed with good-for-skin ingredients to help keep your skin looking healthy and glowing this winter season. What’s included? Vitamin Enriched Face Base, Extra Lip Tint in Bare Pink, Mini Vitamin Enriched Eye Base (3ml), Mini Soothing Cleansing Oil (15ml), Black Cosmetics Bag

fields.name: Bobbi Brown GOLDEN GLAMOUR
fields.description: Create a lit-from-within golden hour glow with a selection of our bestsellers. Housed in a luxurious golden box this is the ultimate gift to treat yourself or a loved one this season. Start by prepping and nourishing the skin with our most iconic product Vitamin Enriched Face Base. Add a touch of effortless glamour to your eyes with the highly pigmented Luxe Eyeshadow in Moonstone, a universal flattering shade for all skin tones. Create beautiful lashes with our #1 mascara Smokey Eye Mascara. Finally add a touch of our bestselling highlighter in pink glow to give an effortless radiant look in moments. What’s included? Vitamin Enriched Face Base 50ml, Luxe Eyeshadow in Moonstone, Smokey Eye Mascara 6ml, Highlighting Powder in Pink Glow

fields.name: Bobbi Brown GET YOUR GLOW
fields.description: The ultimate skincare wardrobe. This ultra moisturising collection contains nourishing ingredients to re-energise winter skin for a glowing complexion. What’s included? Extra Illuminating Moisture Balm, Bare Glow 30ml, Extra Lip Tint, Bare Pink 2.9g, Extra Repair Eye Cream 15ml

fields.name: Rio Lush Rose Gold 24 Piece Make-up Brush
fields.description: With the correct tools, you can expertly create any makeup look with ease – and this is where Rio’s Lush Rose Gold Makeup Brush Collection steps in. Presented in a protective travel-friendly pouch, the set comprises a whopping 24 eye, face and lip brushes, offering everything you need to experiment, explore and express yourself through a limitless range of looks. Encased in sleek gold-tone ferrules, the brushes feature super-soft synthetic bristles and are fitted with an ergonomic precision handle that makes blending, buffing, lining, highlighting, shading and contouring a dream. What’s included? Large Fan Brush, Large Powder & Bronzer Brush, Highlighting & Contour Brush, Liquid Foundation Brush, Flat Blusher Brush, Delicate Fan Brush, Blending Brush, Magic Concealer Brush, Small Bronzer Brush, Flat Nose Shading Brush, Blending Nose Shading Brush, Angled Eyeliner Brush, Flat Eyebrow Brush, Eye Shadow Tapered Brush, Eye Shadow Corner Brush, Eye Shadow Base Brush, Precision Contour Brush, Small, Concealer Brush, Precision Lip Liner Brush, Full Coverage Lip Brush, Corner Coverage Lip Brush, Sponge Eyeshadow Brush, Mascara Definition Brush, Dual Eyebrow & Lash Comb

fields.name: CHANEL No.5 Eau de Parfum Twist and Spray
fields.description: N°5, the very essence of femininity. A powdery floral bouquet. A timeless, legendary fragrance that comes in a refillable purse spray you can take with you anywhere

fields.name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Eau de Parfum Twist and Spray
fields.description: The essence of a bold, free woman. An oriental fragrance with a strong personality, yet surprisingly fresh. The eau de parfum comes in a TWIST AND SPRAY format you can slip into your purse. A simple twist envelops you in the modern notes of this oriental-fresh fragrance.

fields.name: CHANEL Gabrielle Chanel Eau de Parfum Twist and Spray
fields.description: The luminous floral notes of the GABRIELLE CHANEL fragrance in a travel-friendly format to take wherever you go

fields.name: CHANEL Chance Eau de Parfum Twist and Spray
fields.description: A floral-fruity fragrance in a round bottle. Soft and tender top notes sweep you into a whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. The TWIST AND SPRAY slips easily into your purse, the ideal way to revive your fragrance throughout the day. An olfactory encounter with chance

fields.name: CHANEL Le Lion De Chanel Eau de Parfum
fields.description: Proud and passionate, Gabrielle Chanel fully embodied her astrological sign. Instinctive and daring, she took inspiration from it. The lion became her totem animal. Powerful and carnal, the ambery, leather-like notes of labdanum are softened and brightened by vanilla and bergamot. LE LION DE CHANEL is a warm, majestic and refined fragrance

fields.name: Secret Linen White Bed Linen Set
fields.description: This white bedding collection has a relaxed and tousled finish, perfect for those that prefer to spend their time snoozing rather than ironing, and we think the odd wrinkle or two only adds to its charm. When caring for your bed linen, pop it in the machine and wash at 40 degrees, you'll soon discover (like all good things!) it gets better with time, becoming softer and softer after every wash.

fields.name: Secret Linen Super Soft Sateen Sage Bed
fields.description: Silky and sumptuous, our Super Soft Sateen Sage Bed Linen collection is one for those who enjoy the finer things in life. Each piece is crafted from 100% long-staple cotton yarns dyed a delicate shade of green and boasts a 300 thread count to create a warm and breathable fabric suitable for use all year round. For an added touch of refinement, these luxury bedding beauties have a smooth sateen weave and have been laundered to give them a lustrous shine and beautiful drape

fields.name: Secret Linen Sage Stripe Bed Linen
fields.description: Get that slow Sunday morning feeling every day with our easy-living Sage Stripe 100% Linen Bedding range. Crafted in Portugal from nothing but top-quality French flax, each piece in this collection is laundered to super soft perfection and detailed by nearly-neutral light green stripes for a look that'll sit pretty in any style of interior. But what makes this material truly magical is its breathable qualities that help wick away moisture and regulate body temperature for year-round comfort

fields.name: Secret Linen Brushed Cotton Ticking Stripe French Blue Bed Linen
fields.description: Hunker down in style and snooze till spring with our Ticking Stripe French Blue Bedding. Beautifully crafted in Portugal from 100% sumptuously soft brushed cotton, this cosy collection is carefully combed to create a snuggly, fluffy texture, similar to your favourite pair of flannel PJs. While its brushed fibres work a charm at trapping warm air (perfect for when the temperature plummets!), cotton's breathable qualities ensure you don't get overly toasty, keeping you comfy as you sleep

fields.name: Secret Linen Walter Stripe Bed Linen
fields.description: Walter is different to our other stripes being woven with a percale weave to give it a cotton crispness. Perfect for those who prefer slipping under cool crisp bed linen rather than soft and laundered. Walter is still soft but is as happy to be ironed to perfection as left relaxed with one or two crinkles. Walter is made from 260 thread count cotton which means that ironing, if you do so wish, is a doddle and a pleasure. Walter has a smart Breton textured stripe in delicious dark grey. We think this bed linen has a hotel smartness and sophistication to it, making you feel like a very special sleeper indeed.

fields.name: Secret Linen Breton Stripe Midnight Blue Bed Linen
fields.description: This colour combination of dark midnight blue and natural yarns has become one of our favourites. Our Breton Stripe bed linen makes a smooth, silky statement and is fully reversible. Made from our best 100% cotton (50% Egyptian cotton) with a super 260 thread count, we've finished this blue bedding set with our sateen soft finish, that feels smooth and luxurious night after night

fields.name: Secret Linen Vintage Rose Bed Linen
fields.description: For a bed that just begs to be snuggled, nothing beats the softness of 100% linen bedding. This set has been made with love in Portugal, with each piece being individually dyed a lovely earthy pink for a completely one-off finish. Part of our natural bedding range, all of our linen items are woven from French flax, making brilliantly breathable bedding that keeps your body temperature regulated for maximum all-night comfort.

fields.name: Secret Linen Soloman Green Throw
fields.description: Our gorgeous green Soloman throw is made from a mix of cotton and recycled fibres which is incredibly soft and cost to touch. This green throw has a beautiful drape and will sit perfectly over any bed. Soloman is the perfect partner for our dreamy Sea Green 100% Linen bedding and our Soloman Cushion Cover

fields.name: Secret Linen Spice Big Waffle Bed Throw
fields.description: Transport your mind to somewhere a little more tropical cocooned in our Spice Big Waffle Bed Throw. A focus-stealing addition to your soft furnishings, this throw is lovingly crafted in Portugal from 100% cotton yarns with an invitingly tactile waffle weave and wonderfully soft laundered feel. A generously sized 230 x 260cm, this bed throw is just what you need to wrap up the whole family and whisk them away to daydreams of exotic climes. For a nod to boho chic, drape this bedtime beauty over our Olive Green 100% Linen Bedding

fields.name: Secret Linen Sonny Throw
fields.description: Our Sonny throw in off white, with bold black stripes is so soft, the team have been drooling over it since first touch. Made from a perfect mix of wool and acrylic, the softness of this throw is made for wrapping yourself up in. We’ve made Sonny is two sizes as we just know it’s going to be a good one. Choose from 140cm x 200cm for single to king size beds, and our 230cm x 260cm option for King to Emperor size beds. Both sizes are finished with a fringe on the shorter ends. Lovely jubbly

fields.name: OKA Majuro Cushion Cover
fields.description: This linen cushion cover features a bold red hand-block printed design. The abstract pattern has an exotic, coastal feel; hence the name, taken from a stunning Pacific island. Complete with a decorative tassel on one corner, it brings a travelled touch to any sofa.

fields.name: OKA Yuma Cushion Cover
fields.description: Our Yuma Cushion Cover features a tri-colour geometric print, hand-made from thick stonewashed cotton. Native Americans valued their hand-woven textiles so much that their empire used them as currency and to reinforce their cultural dominance, and this rich history has formed the backbone behind the designs of these cushion covers

fields.name: OKA Dandolo Cushion Cover
fields.description: A hand-made Venetian-inspired cushion cover finished in blue/natural, featuring applique and elegant embroidery on its front. The Cornaro is an intricate piece to make: the fabric is painted using a sponge and then dried in the sun, then a pumice stone is rubbed across the fabric to create a hand-brushed effect. Crafted from cotton, it brings a classic touch to any sofa.

fields.name: OKA Vataro Cushion Cover
fields.description: Searching for a stripy, velvet, reversible cushion cover? Say hello to the Vataro. Combining a modern chevron stripe design with a different coloured velvet on each side, it’s both versatile and fun. Use it to inject colour into a neutral scheme.

fields.name: OKA Areca Cushion Cover
fields.description: Our Areca Cushion Cover is here to bring island paradise vibes to your space. Featuring a green or blue palm stripe on a white linen background, it recalls days spent basking beneath the trees on a tropical beach and is perfect for giving a sofa or bed a summery update. All you need is a cocktail, a gripping read and some sunglasses if you plan on using Areca alfresco –  just remember to bring it back inside when you head in for the evening.

fields.name: OKA Cashmere Cushion Cover
fields.description: This cushion cover is tactile and luxurious, courtesy of its very soft fibres that have been sourced from cashmere goats. Great for layering, its versatile hue allows it to complement a wide array of interiors.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat Patisserie Sleekster Luxe
fields.description: The best baked goods around, reimagined in the eyes of a chocolatier. We’ve taken your favorite puds, pies and sweet treats and recreated them in chocolate form. Perfect for when you need to satisfy that craving for something sweet in one bite. For fresh and fruity flavours, our Raspberry Panna Cotta is full of tangy raspberry notes, with creamy mellow undertones to balance out the tartness. We just love cheesecake, which is why we had to recreate our own Lemon Cheesecake: we use real mascarpone to achieve that authentic tang. We’ve captured the most indulgent flavours with our Fudge Sundae - think sticky toffee, mellow hazelnut and moreish milk chocolate. We might be biased, but we think our Mousse au Chocolat is just as decadent as the original, made from high cocoa dark and milk chocolate and lashings of double cream. No patisserie box would be complete without a shelf of macarons - in our Patisserie Luxe expect the flavours of strawberry, vanilla and chocolate ice cream in our Neapolitan Macaron, and the sweet, yet tangy, caramel notes of our Caramel Cheesecake. Don’t worry - our bakery doesn’t just end there. We’ve got 44 chocolates stored away in this box, perfect for enjoying alongside a picnic on a summer’s day, or tucking into as an after-dinner treat.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Chocolate Cream Liqueur Collection
fields.description: Chocolate Cream Liqueur sets the tone for this crowd-pleasing collection. If they love the creamy yet deep, warming taste of our award-winning tipple, they’ll adore it sealed in 50% milk chocolate for the Chocolate Cream Liqueur Selector, and followed by our Salted Espresso Martini Selector and mellow 40% Milk Chocolate Batons. Chocolate Cream Liqueur – 200ml. World Liqueur Awards – Best English Cream winner. We wanted a spirit that allowed our full-bodied 70% dark chocolate to really sing out. Something clean, contemporary and entirely different. It had to be vodka with lashings of real cream. Chocolate Cream Liqueur Selector. We melted our 70% dark chocolate into vodka and cream, then sealed it in 50% milk chocolate 40% Milk Chocolate Batons. Our batons are carefully designed to be the perfect way to appreciate the tasting notes of our signature chocolate grades. Here, find 15 cast in our 40% milk chocolate: velvety-smooth creaminess with a deeply satisfying cacao hit. Salted Espresso Martini Selector. To create this cocktail chocolate we took a slug of our own award-winning Salted Caramel Vodka Liqueur, a punch of organic Turkish coffee and a pinch of salt, then sealed it in caramel chocolate.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Everything Chocolate Hamper Collection
fields.description: You don't always have to know someone for long to know you like them - sometimes you just click. If you've just met someone who you know means something to you but you're not sure of their taste in chocolate, this carefully curated collection of some of our best-loved recipes will make an effortless gift. You'll have another interest in common! The Everything Chocolate Collection includes: 40% Milk Chocolate Puddles, Nano Slab Milk 50% with dark cookies, Nano Slab Dark with Fruit and Nuts, Nano Slab Salted Caramel, Billionaire's Shortbread Selector, The Brownie Selector, Salted Caramel Puddles, Patisserie Collection

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Velvetiser Hot Chocolate Maker
fields.description: Imagined by Hotel Chocolat, engineered by Dualit, this chic hot chocolate machine creates barista-grade hot chocolate, made with real grated chocolate flakes, in just 2.5 minutes. No need for the resident hot chocolate maker to slave over a hot stove, slowly heating milk and showering cocoa powder. Instead, simply plug in your Velvetiser, choose your chocolate and your milk – dairy or plant-based, or even water if you prefer – and press the button. Plus, with the removable whisk and non-stick coating, cleaning is easy – just rinse out with cold water. (It’s not suitable for dishwashers – but they’d just slow you down anyway

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Chocolate & Fizz Collection
fields.description: We know that look, someone you love just got some really good news, didn't they? Show them how proud and happy you are with the classic congratulations gift: chocolate and a bottle of bubbly! We've brought together some of our best-loved recipes to help you say well done, whatever their taste because they deserve it! The Chocolate & Fizz Collection includes: Mini Everything Selection, Salted Caramel Puddles, Champagne Chocolate Truffles, Prosecco, Dark Fruit and Nut Nano Slab, Salted Caramel Nano Slab

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The All About Batons Collection
fields.description: Our solid chocolate baton was carefully designed to be the perfect way to experience the tasting notes of all our chocolate grades. Its elegant size and smooth curves make it ideal for nibbling, savouring and sharing. Now, we’ve taken this icon of our collection up a notch with recipes inspired by patisserie, peanut butter and beyond. Milk chocolate Batons, Rich and deeply chocolatey, like all the best brownies. Pecan brings its own natural roasted notes, balanced by cacao. Strawberry Cheesecake Batons, It’s the real mascarpone and real strawberry that makes this cheesecake-inspired recipe taste so authentic. High-cacao white tames any tanginess to a mellow fruitiness. Peanut Butter Batons, A melt of caramel-milk chocolate with roasted notes of peanut butter. Enhanced with a tingle of fine French sea salt. Orange Batons, Opening melt of deep-yet-mellow 50% milk, with zippy Seville orange and fine shards of buttery wafer.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat Pink Champagne Truffle Tin
fields.description: Walk past our chocolate factory and you’ll hear Champagne corks popping. Presented in a keepsake tin, with real Champagne in every truffle, whipped into real cream and smooth milk chocolate with a hint of strawberry. Other chocolate makers? They use Marc de Champagne – a fiery spirit made from grape skins and stalks. Authenticity always tastes better.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Biscuits & Hot Chocolate Collection
fields.description: Not just another night in: make it something special with Biscuits of the Gods, batons and hot chocolate waiting in the wings. Biscuits of the Gods – Chocolat Pillows, Eight chocolate biscuits that are all about the chocolate: 3 parts chocolate brimming with crème to 1 part modest, crisp biscuit. And they’re served in a chic, embossed keepsake tin. 40% Milk Chocolate Batons, Our batons are carefully designed to be the perfect way to appreciate the tasting notes of our signature chocolate grades. Here, find 15 cast in our 40% milk chocolate: velvety-smooth creaminess with a deeply satisfying cacao hit. Milky Hot Chocolate, Great Taste Award winner. A comforting, not-too-sweet drinking chocolate made with grated flakes of our 50% milk chocolate. Mellow and creamy, with satisfying cacao depth. Salted Caramel Hot Chocolate. Academy of Chocolate Gold Award winner. An embrace of malty, deep caramel drinking chocolate with a just-perfect salt tingle.

fields.name: Hotel Chocolat The Classic Cabinet
fields.description: There’s a dark wooden box with drawers in our Inventing Room; in it, we keep all our working creations. Modelled after that chocolate cabinet, this collection features some of our most celebrated milk, white and dark recipes, including biscuits, truffles, pralines, fruities and caramels. For the dessert-devotees, we’ve recreated some of the most celebrated puds, in chocolate form. Our Eton Mess uses real freeze-dried strawberry pieces in the mousse to capture that authentic fragrant berry flavour. Wrapped in a thick layer of high-cocoa butter white chocolate and dotted with crisp meringue pieces, who can say no to this quintessentially British pud? No chocolate box would be complete without the addition of a praline or two (or three in our case). We pack our Walnut Praline with roasted walnuts, served smooth in a mellow praline. Or why not sample our Praline 80%? Our most intense praline yet - we use both smooth hazelnut praline and nibbed hazelnuts for a ridiculously moreish crunch. The odd tipple even makes an appearance - have a cocktail on us, with our Mojito truffle. Strong on the rum, crushed mint and lime, we use rum made by Saint Lucia Distillers, just down the road from our Rabot Estate cocoa plantation. Or dip into our Gin Truffle: an award-winning creation, experience lively, floral notes with plenty of juniper, sealed in an intensely deep dark. That’s not all The Classic Cabinet has to offer - at least two of each to save any arguments over who gets what. Serve as a stunning, yet stress-free, centrepiece after dinner, gift to that special person, or simply dive in with friends and family.

fields.name: NEOM Perfect Night’s Sleep Reed Diffuser
fields.description: A really special complex blend using only 100% natural fragrances with 19 of the purest possible dreamy essential oils including English lavender, precious jasmine & sweet basil plus little touches of other perfectly chosen natural essential oils expertly blended to help prepare for sleep. Use this Reed Diffuser in your bedroom. To enhance the fragrance from this sleep diffuser turn the reeds before bedtime and spritz the Perfect Night's Sleep Pillow Mist. Lasts up to 12 weeks / 100ml (3.38 fl oz) 100% natural fragrances

fields.name: NEOM Luxury De-Stress Reed Diffuser
fields.description: Taking time to create calm is something we're passionate about which is why we developed our NEOM Scent to De-Stress Range with our special Real Luxury fragrance. 100% natural fragrance which expertly blends 24 of the purest possible essential oils including lavender, Brazilian rosewood and jasmine with which not only smells wonderful but can help bring a feeling of calm whenever you need it most. This Reed Diffuser can be used to help create a calm zone. You can intensify the fragrance by lighting a Real Luxury Scented Candle or spritzing the Real Luxury Home Mist Lasts up to 12 weeks / 100ml (3.38 fl oz) 100% natural fragrances

fields.name: NEOM Happiness Home Fragrance Duo Diffuser
fields.description: Our 100% natural,, expertly blended Happiness fragrance which intricately blends 7 essential oils including white neroli, woody and powdery mimosa and zingy lemon, which can help you feel more positive and uplifted. Layer this scent with a Happiness Scented Candle and Home Mist for a more intense scent. Lasts up to 12 weeks / 100ml (3.38 fl oz) Contains 1 x Reed Diffuser & 1 x Reed Diffuser Refill

fields.name: NEOM Luxury Scented 3 Wick Candle
fields.description: 100% natural fragrance which expertly blends 24 of the purest possible essential oils including lavender, Brazilian rosewood and jasmine with which not only smells wonderful, but can also help you relax and unwind. Winner of 2017 Psychologies Magazine, #realnatural Beauty & Wellness Edit. 3 wick with up to 50 hour burn time / 420g Hand poured using 100% natural wax

fields.name: NEOM Energised Mornings & Calm Nights Candle Set
fields.description: Two original must-have 1 Wick Candles to help with those morning boosts and much-needed moments of calm. Includes one Feel Refreshed and one Real Luxury Scented Candle. This gift says, I want you to feel your best everyday. What better gift is there than the gift to make you feel good all day long? Contains 1 Real Luxury & 1 Feel Refreshed 1 wick Scented Candle packed in a beautiful NEOM gift box. Each with a 35 hour burn time / 185g. Real Luxury expertly blends 24 of the purest essential oils including lavender, Brazilian rosewood and jasmine. Feel Refreshed is a potent combination of 24 essential oils including Sicilian lemon & fresh basil

fields.name: O.P.I Shine Bright Collection Treatment Pack
fields.description: Explore the holiday season's latest range of bold and sophisticated colours with the Shine Bright Treatment 4 piece Mini Pack

fields.name: O.P.I ProSpa Manicure Kit
fields.description: Nourish, file, go with an essential manicure kit and ProSpa travel bag.

fields.name: O.P.I Shine Bright Collection Lunar
fields.description: Explore the holiday season's latest range of bold and sophisticated colours with our Shine Bright Lunar New Year Nail Lacquer Trio Pack which comes with a free swarovski gift.

fields.name: O.P.I Shine Bright Collection Mini 25 Piece
fields.description: Explore the new season's latest range of bold and sophisticated colours with our Shine Bright Nail Lacquer Mini 25-Pack Advent Calendar

fields.name: O.P.I Mexico City Collection Color Trio
fields.description: Explore a range of new colour options with the Mexico City Infinite Shine Trio
